title: Suzlon Energy bags 1,166 MW order from NTPC
description: Suzlon Group has secured India's largest wind turbine order of 1,166 MW from NTPC Green Energy Ltd. The project involves installing 370 wind turbines in Gujarat and will be the biggest wind energy initiative by a PSU in the state. Suzlon's cumulative order book now approaches 5 GW.
